mainHero.title: We Grow Money
mainHero.subtitle: On Trees
mainHero.description: Welcome to WeGrow, where it's all about talented individuals teaming up, sharing smarts, and making cool stuff happen, all at no cost. It's a real-deal community for folks who code, create, and hustle. Jump in, swap ideas, level up your skills, and be part of turning big dreams into reality. We're about growing together, project by project, connection after connection.

items.title: Collaborative Innovation
items.description: Discover how we leverage collective intelligence to foster groundbreaking projects.

items.title: Skill Development
items.description: Learn about our resources and programs designed to enhance your professional skills.

features.title: Why WeGrow
features.subtitle: A Community of Difference Makers
features.description: At WeGrow, we're not just building projects; we're cultivating an ecosystem of innovation and growth. Here's why our platform stands out.

items.name: Networking
items.description: Connect with like-minded professionals and expand your network in a dynamic environment.

items.name: Mentorship
items.description: Gain insights and guidance from experienced professionals in various tech fields.

items.name: Resource Sharing
items.description: Access a wealth of knowledge and tools to bring your ideas to life.

items.name: Project Collaboration
items.description: Engage in exciting projects and collaborate with a community of talented individuals.

pricing.title: Join the Movement
pricing.description: WeGrow is free to join. Be a part of our growing community and start making an impact today!

sections.name: Our Mission
sections.content: Learn about our commitment to fostering a thriving community of tech innovators and creators.

sections.name: Our Story
sections.content: Discover the journey of WeGrow, from a simple idea to a bustling community of tech enthusiasts.

sections.name: Meet the Team
sections.content: Get to know the minds behind WeGrow, a group of passionate professionals dedicated to your growth.

sections.name: Success Stories
sections.content: Read inspiring stories of how WeGrow has helped members achieve their dreams.
